00045 /**
00046    @brief Base class for analysis engines
00047 
00048 */
00049 class APTLIB_API BaseEngine : public Options {
00050 
00051 public:
00052 
00053   virtual std::string getEngineName() {
00054     return "BaseEngine";
00055   }
00056 
00057   /**
00058    * Constructor
00059    */
00060   BaseEngine();

00063    * Constructor

00069    * Destructor
00070    */
00071   virtual ~BaseEngine();

00107   void checkDiskSpace();

00137   virtual void checkDiskSpaceImp() {}

00140   void printEngineOptions() {
00141       printOptions(getEngineName() + ": ");
00142   }
00143 
00144   void printEngineOptions(const std::string &label) {
00145       printOptions(getEngineName() + ": " + label);

00163 /*! A class used to self register engine data classes. */
00164 class APTLIB_API EngineReg
00165 {
00166 public:
00167     /*! Constructor 
00168      * @param engName The name of the engine to create.
00169      */
00170     EngineReg(const std::string &engName);
00171 
00172     /*! Destructor */
00173     virtual ~EngineReg();
00174 
00175     /*! Creates an engine object.
00176      * @param name The name of the engine to create.
00177      * @return A pointer to the engine. NULL if the failed.
00178      */
00179     static BaseEngine *CreateEngine(const std::string &name);
00180 
00181     /*! Gets the list of all registered engines.
00182      * @return The list of registered engines.
00183      */
00184     static std::list<std::string> GetEngineNames();
00185 
00186 private:
00187 
00188     /*! Makes an engine data object.
00189      * @return The engine data object.
00190      */
00191     virtual BaseEngine *MakeObject() = 0;
00192 
00193     /*! A pointer to the first registered engine. */
00194     static EngineReg *m_Head;
00195 
00196     /*! A pointer to the next registered engine. */
00197     EngineReg *m_Next;
00198 
00199     /*! The name of the engine. */
00200     std::string name;
00201 };
